definition: (of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: The seed-heads should be hung up to dry.
sentences.chinese: 应该把那些种子穗挂起来晒干。

sentences.english: Some gardeners plant potatoes under straw, or stems of dried grain.
sentences.chinese: 一些园艺家在稿杆或晒干了的谷物茎杆下中土豆。

sentences.english: But the hot days of summer had dried up all the mountain brooks.
sentences.chinese: 可是夏季的炎热天气已经把所有的山涧小溪都晒干了。

sentences.english: Wash your bras by hand, and never put them in the dryer or sun-dry them.
sentences.chinese: 手洗文胸，不要放在烘干机里或晒干。

sentences.english: Women and children hang tobacco to dry in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 女人和孩子把烟叶悬挂起来在太阳下晒干。

sentences.english: When the sun dries up the water, people can get salt from the ground.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳把水晒干时，人们就从地上得到了盐。

sentences.english: In China people can make a soup with lily bulbs after they are dried up in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，百合的球根晒干后更可用来煮汤。

sentences.english: I will bring my bedding out, and dry it in the sun, said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 我会把我的寝具移出来，在太阳下晒干，托德先生说。

sentences.english: We would dry the wood in the sun and eat it.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在太阳下先把木头晒干，再咽下。

sentences.english: I cooked it over a fire or dried it in the sun .
sentences.chinese: 我把它架在火上烤或搁在太阳下晒干。

sentences.english: In cooking quality of dehydrated foods are usually superior to sun-dried counterparts.
sentences.chinese: 脱水干燥食品的烹调特性通常优于对照的晒干食品。

sentences.english: Do not let plants dry out, but do not overwater.
sentences.chinese: 不要让植物晒干，但不深数。

sentences.english: Grains must be aired in the sun before it can be stored.
However, sun-dried animal flesh and fish can be highly acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 不过，晒干的动物肉和鱼很受欢迎。

sentences.english: The drug is collected in autumn, and dried in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 秋季采割绿色的草质茎，晒干。

sentences.english: The earth, in summer, is as quickly dried as the cheek of a child.
sentences.chinese: 夏天地面很快被晒干，就象孩子的面颊一样。

definition: to lay sth out to dry
to dry over a fire/to roast
to mash/to beat to a pulp
to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder
